name: fastify-sessions
description: Session plugin for fastify written in TypeScript supporting both stateless and stateful sessions, fork of @mgcrea/fastify-session adding a lot of features while keeping compatibility.
author: dmkng <susan@themaking.party>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run prettycheck && npm run typecheck && npm run spec
scripts.benchmark:cryptoSeal: tsc --showConfig > test/tsconfig.json && cross-env TS_NODE_DIR=test node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader=ts-paths-esm-loader/transpile-only --no-warnings test/benchmark/cryptoSeal.ts
scripts.benchmark:cryptoUnseal: tsc --showConfig > test/tsconfig.json && cross-env TS_NODE_DIR=test node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader=ts-paths-esm-loader/transpile-only --no-warnings test/benchmark/cryptoUnseal.ts
scripts.benchmark:cryptoSerialize: tsc --showConfig > test/tsconfig.json && cross-env TS_NODE_DIR=test node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader=ts-paths-esm-loader/transpile-only --no-warnings test/benchmark/cryptoSerialize.ts
scripts.benchmark:cryptoDeserialize: tsc --showConfig > test/tsconfig.json && cross-env TS_NODE_DIR=test node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader=ts-paths-esm-loader/transpile-only --no-warnings test/benchmark/cryptoDeserialize.ts
